Lore: Select 5 cards from either you or your opponent's Graveyard and remove them from the current duel.

Name: Soul of the Pure
Lore: Increases a selected player's Life Points by 800 points.

Name: Sparks
Lore: Inflicts 200 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Name: Spear Cretin
Lore: FLIP: After this card is flipped, when it is sent to the Graveyard, both you and your opponent select 1 monster from your respective Graveyards and Special Summon it on the field in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position (no Tribute is required for monsters of Level 5 or more).

Name: Spellbinding Circle
Lore: Select 1 monster.  As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the selected monster cannot attack or change its battle position except by the effect of a Magic, Trap or Effect Monster Card. When the selected monster is destroyed, this card is also destroyed. If the selected monster is offered as a Tribute, this card is not destroyed.

Name: Spike Seadra
Lore: Using the spikes sprouting from its body, this creature stabs its opponents and floods them with electricity.

Name: Spirit of the Books
Lore: This wise spirit dwells in books, using its accumulated knowledge to defeat enemies.

Name: Spirit of the Harp
Lore: A spirit that soothes the soul with the music of its heavenly harp.

Name: Stain Storm
Lore: Destroys all Machine-type monsters on the field.

Name: Star Boy
Lore: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all WATER monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all FIRE monsters by 400 points.

Name: Steel Ogre Grotto #1
Lore: A steel idol worshipped in the Land of Machines.

Name: Steel Ogre Grotto #2
Lore: A mechanized iron doll with tremendous strength.

Name: Steel Scorpion
Lore: Non Machine-type Monsters attacking "Steel Scorpion" will be destroyed at the End Phase of your opponent's turn 3 turns later.

Name: Steel Shell
Lore: A WATER monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 ponits and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Name: The Stern Mystic
Lore: FLIP: All face-down cards on the field are turned face-up, and then returned to their original positions. No card effects are activated when cards are turned face-up.

Name: Stim-Pack
Lore: A monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 700 points. Its ATK is then decreased by 300 points at each of its Standby Phases.

Name: Stone Armadiller
Lore: With a body armored by rock-hard fur, this monster features excellent defense capabilities.

Name: Stone Ogre Grotto
Lore: A behemoth shaped by giant boulders.

Name: Stop Defense
Lore: Select 1 of your opponent's monsters and switch it to Attack Position. If the card is face-down, flip it face-up. If the card has a flip effect, it is activated immediately.

Name: Stuffed Animal
Lore: It may look like a harmless stuffed animal, but its zipper mouth deals a deadly bite.

Name: Succubus Knight
Lore: An unworthy warrior wizard adept in casting death-dealing spells.

Name: Suijin
Lore: Reduce the ATK of an opponent's monster attacking this card to 0. This effect can be used only once. The card's owner chooses when to activate this effect.

Name: Summoned Skull
Lore: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy.  Among the Fiend-type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

Name: Super War-Lion
Lore: This monster is summoned with the Ritual Magic Card, "War-Lion Ritual". You must also offer monsters whose total Level stars equal 7 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

Name: Supporter in the Shadows
Lore: A cute little elf that hides in the shadows and provides spiritual support.

Name: Swamp Battleguard
Lore: Increase the ATK of this monster by 500 points for every face-up "Lava Battleguard" on your side of the field.

Name: Sword Arm of Dragon
Lore: With a body covered in sword-like thorns, nothing dares stand in the way of this charging monster.

Name: Sword of Dark Destruction
Lore: A DARK monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Name: Sword of Deep-Seated
Lore: A Monster Card equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 500 points.  When this card is sent to the Graveyard, place it on top of your Deck.

Name: Sword of Dragon's Soul
Lore: This card can only be used to equip by a Warrior-type monster to increase its ATK by 700 points. Any Dragon-type monster battling a monster equipped with this card is automatically destroyed at the end of a Battle Phase, regardless of ATK/DEF. (Damage calculations are applied normally).

Name: Swords of Revealing Light
Lore: Counting from your opponent's turn, none of your opponent's monsters can attack for 3 turns of his/her own. When this card is activated, opponent's face-down monsters at that time are turned face-up, but remain in Defense Position. Any effects the monsters may have are immediately activated.

Name: Swordsman from a Foreign Land
Lore: A monster attacked by this card will be destroyed at the End Phase 5 turns later.

Name: Swordstalker
Lore: A monster formed by the vengeful souls of those who passed away in battle.

Name: Tailor of the Fickle
Lore: Select 1 equipped Equip Card and switch it to another correct target.

Name: Tainted Wisdom
Lore: When this card is changed from Attack to Defense Position, shuffle your own Deck.

Name: Takriminos
Lore: A member of a race of sea serpents that freely travels through the sea.

Name: Takuhee
Lore: This bird is known far and wide as a harbinger of doom.

Name: Tao the Chanter
Lore: Master of Yin and Yang, this wizard handles a delicate balance of spells and counterspells.

Name: Temple of Skulls
Lore: A mysterious temple of skulls and bones that sucks in unwary enemies.

Name: Tenderness
Lore: An adorable fairy that celebrates the gift of love.

Name: Terra the Terrible
Lore: Known as a swamp dweller, this creature is a minion of the dark forces.

Name: The Thing That Hides in the Mud
Lore: This monster melts its way underground to attack enemies from below.

Name: Thousand Dragon
Lore: Time Wizard + Baby Dragon

Name: Three-Headed Geedo
Lore: A three-headed nocturnal monster that is absolutely ruthless when fighting.

Name: Thunder Dragon

Name: Tiger Axe
Lore: A fast and powerful axe-wielding beast-warrior.

Name: Time Machine
Lore: When 1 monster is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can return it to the field in the same battle position as a Special Summon.

Name: Time Seal
Lore: Your opponent skips the Draw Phase of his/her next turn.

Name: Time Wizard
Lore: Toss a coin and call Heads or tails. If you call it right, your opponent's monsters on the field are destroyed. If you call it wrong, your own monsters on the field are destroyed and you lose Life Points equal to half the total ATK of the destroyed monsters.  This card can be used only during your own turn, once per turn.

Name: Toad Master
Lore: A hermit frog that has been in existence for thousands of years, it attacks with tadpoles.

Name: Togex
Lore: An agile monster that rolls up to ram its opponents.

Name: Toll
Lore: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, both you and your opponent must pay 500 Life Points per monster to attack.

Name: Tomozaurus
Lore: Small but vicious, this monster even attacks its own kind.

Name: Tongyo
Lore: This monster captures other fish with its long tongue and sucks the energy out of them.

Name: Toon Alligator
Lore: An alligator monster straight from the cartoons.

Name: Toon Mermaid
Lore: This card cannot be summoned unless "Toon World" is on the field. This card cannot attack in the same turn that it is summoned. Pay 500 Life Points each time this monster attacks. When "Toon World" is destroyed, this card is also destroyed. If your opponent doesn't control a Toon monster on the field, this card may inflict Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points. If a Toon monster is on your opponent's side of the field, your attacks must target the Toon monster.

Name: Toon Summoned Skull
Lore: This card cannot be summoned unless "Toon World" is on the field. This card cannot attack in the same turn that it is summoned. Pay 500 Life Points each time this monster attacks. When "Toon World" is destroyed, this card is also destroyed. If your opponent doesn't control a Toon monster on the field, this card may inflict Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points. If a Toon monster is on your opponent's side of the field, your attacks must target the Toon monster.

Name: Toon World
Lore: This card is activated by paying 1000 of your Life Points.

Name: Torike
Lore: Although a poor defender, this monster's sharp horn gives it an edge when attacking.

Name: Total Defense Shogun
Lore: When this card is summoned (excluding Special Summon), it is placed on the field in Defense Position. This card can attack without being shifted to Attack Position. Damage results are calculated normally.

Name: Trakadon
Lore: A tiger-striped dragon that is often seen racing across the wasteland at tremendous speeds.

Name: Trap Hole

Name: Trap Master
Lore: FLIP: Destroys 1 Trap Card on the field. If this card's target is face-down, flip it face-up. If the card is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If not, it is returned to its face-down position. The flipped card is not activated.

Name: Tremendous Fire
Lore: Inflicts 1000 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points and 500 points of Direct Damage to your Life Points.

Name: Trent
Lore: A guardian of the woods, this massive tree is believed to be immortal.

Name: Tri-Horned Dragon
Lore: An unworthy dragon with three sharp horns sprouting from its head.

Name: Trial of Nightmare
Lore: This fiend passes judgment on enemies that are locked in coffins.

Name: Tribute to The Doomed
Lore: You can destroy 1 opponent's monster (regardless of its position) by discarding 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

Name: Tripwire Beast
Lore: This creature attacks with electromagnetic waves.

Name: Turtle Oath

Name: Twin-Headed Fire Dragon

Name: Twin-Headed Thunder Dragon

Name: Two-Headed King Rex

Name: Two-Mouth Darkruler

Name: Two-Pronged Attack

Name: Tyhone
Lore: Capable of firing cannonballs from its mouth for long-range attacks, this creature is particularly effective in mountain battles.

Name: Tyhone #2
Lore: A crimson dragon that spits fireballs to create a blazing sea of fire.

Name: UFO Turtle
Lore: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you may select 1 FIRE monster with an ATK of 1500 or less from your Deck and Special Summon it to the field (no Tribute is required for monsters of Level 5 or more). The Deck is then shuffled.

Name: Ultimate Offering
Lore: At the cost of 500 Life Points per monster, a player is allowed  an extra Normal Summon or Set.

Name: Umi
Lore: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua-type monsters by 200 points. Also decreases the ATK and DEF of all Machine and Pyro-type monsters by 200 points.

Name: Umiiruka
Lore: Increases the ATK of all WATER monsters by 500 points and decreases their DEF by 400 points.

Name: The Unhappy Maiden
Lore: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, the Battle Phase for that turn ends immediately.

Name: Unknown Warrior of Fiend

Name: Upstart Goblin
Lore: Draw 1 card from your Deck. Your opponent gains 1000 Life Points.

Name: Uraby
Lore: Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.

Name: Ushi Oni
Lore: A bull fiend restored by the dark arts, this monster appears out of a jar.

Name: Valkyrion the Magna Warrior
Lore: You may [[Special Summon]] this card by offering [[Alpha The Magnet Warrior (EDS)|Alpha The Magnet Warrior]], [[Beta The Magnet Warrior (EDS)|Beta The Magnet Warrior]], and [[Gamma The Magnet Warrior (EDS)|%4792]] from your [[hand]] or the [[field]] as a [[Tribute]].  If Alpha The Magnet Warrior, Beta The Magnet Warrior, and Gamma The Magnet Warrior are in the [[Graveyard]], you can offer this card as a Tribute to Special Summon these 3 cards to the field.

Name: Vermillion Sparrow
Lore: Rhaimundos of the Red Sword + Fireyarou

Lore: A Plant-type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Name: Violent Rain
Lore: This monster can call up sudden torrents of battering rain.

Name: Violet Crystal
Lore: A Zombie-type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Name: Vishwar Randi
Lore: This lady warrior with unquenchable bloodlust serves the forces of darkness.

Name: Vorse Raider
Lore: The axe in the hand of this evil animal has tasted the blood of many monsters.

Name: Waboku
Lore: Any damage inflicted by an opponent's monster is decreased to 0 during the turn this card is activated.

Name: Wall Shadow
Lore: You cannot Normal Summon this monster. This card can only be Special Summoned by offering "Labyrinth Wall" equipped with "Magical Labyrinth" as a Tribute. No other Tribute Monsters are necessary.

Name: Wall of Illusion
Lore: The monster attacking this creature is returned to its owner's hand. Any damage resulting from the attack is calculated normally.

Name: The Wandering Doomed
Lore: A monster that wanders the edges of the netherworld.

Name: War-Lion Ritual
Lore: This card is used to summon "Super War-Lion". You must also offer monsters whose total Level stars equal 6 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

Lore: Destroys all Warrior-type monsters on the field.

Name: Water Magician
Lore: This monster swamps an opponent with an almost endless supply of water.

Name: Water Omotics
Lore: Transforms the water overflowing from her jar into attacking dragons.

Name: Waterdragon Fairy
Lore: A water fairy that is said to be able to summon a giant sea serpent.

Name: Weather Control
Lore: This creature controls weather and is often the cause of mountain storms.

Name: Weather Report
Lore: FLIP: Destroys all opponent's face-up "Swords of Revealing Light" on the field. If "Swords of Revealing Light" is destroyed, you can perform your Battle Phase twice this turn (or your next turn, if activated during opponent's turn).

Lore: Attacks from the skies with a whip-like tail.

Name: The Wicked Worm Beast

Name: Widespread Ruin

Name: Windstorm of Etaqua

Name: Wing Egg Elf

Name: Winged Cleaver

Name: Winged Dragon,Guardian of the Fortress #1

Name: Wings of Wicked Flame

Lore: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all DARK monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all LIGHT monsters by 400 points.

Name: Wodan the Resident of the Forest

Name: Wood Remains

Name: World Suppression

Name: Wow Warrior

Name: Wretched Ghost of the Attic
Lore: A harmless monster found in just about any attic.

Name: Zanki

Lore: This card is used to summon "Zera The Mant". You must also offer monsters whose total Level stars equal 8 or more from the field or your hand as a Tribute.

Name: Zera The Mant
Lore: This monster is summoned with the Ritual Magic Card, "Zera Ritual". You must also offer monsters whose total Level stars equal 8 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

Name: Zoa
Lore: A monster whose full potential can be achieved when outfitted with Metalmorph.

Name: Zombie Warrior
Lore: Skull Servant + Battle Warrior

Name: Zone Eater
Lore: A monster attacked by this card will be destroyed at the End Phase 5 turns later.
